trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chesterfield
There were no other sightings in Chesterfield on or around April 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWe werejust taking a drive listening to some music at about 8:00 last night when all of the sudden a triangle figure in the sky appeared Its was blue and red lights that blinked on and off. When its flew it zig zzaged through the sky. We were on the highway going the opposite way it was going we tryed to turn around to get phootage but it just vanished
Summary: blue and red lights blinked on and off zig zaged through the skie
